line.name: ACE
line.text:
Sandy Reroute  Posted: 05/22/2013  3:32PM

Until further notice:

[A] No trains between Howard Beach-JFK/Broad Channel and the Rockaways due to damage sustained during hurricane Sandy.

Free Shuttle buses operate nonstop between Howard Beach [A] and Mott Av [H] Stations.

[H] Free shuttle trains operate between Mott Av and Beach 90 St, days and evenings.

Q22 buses provide local service in the Rockaways.

Find out more at: http://www.mta.info/nyct/service/RebuildingRockawaysAfterHurricanSandy.htm

line.name: NQR

Allow additional travel time.

line.name: B1 - B83
line.text:
Planned Detour
B25 bus stop closure due to Brooklyn Bridge construction

Until further notice

Buses will not stop on Old Fulton St at Prospect St.

Westbound: Customers are advised to board on
Henry St at Cranberry St or Old Fulton St at Hicks St.

line.name: BX1 - BX55
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 05/22/2013  3:33PM

Bx26 bus detoured due to FDNY activity on Allerton Av between Eastchester Av and Waring Av.

Detour is as follows:

Westbound: Via Allerton Av, left on Eastchester Av, right on Waring Av, right onÂ Fenton Av, left on Allerton Av and regular route.

Corresponding bus sops will be made along Waring Av.Â

Allow additional travel time.Â

line.name: M1 - M116
line.text:
Delays  Posted: 05/22/2013  5:43PM

M5, M7, M20 and M104 buses are running with delays due to heavy traffic on 6 Av and 7 Av.

Allow additional travel time.



Delays  Posted: 05/22/2013  5:36PM

M7, M11, M20, M34A, M42, M50 and M104 buses are running with delays in both directions due to heavy traffic at the Lincoln Tunnel.

Service Change  Posted: 05/22/2013  3:33PM

M9 buses are detoured due to construction in the intersection of Houston St and Essex St.

Detour is as follows:

Southbound: Via Houston St, left on Allen St, left on Delancey St, right on Essex St and regular route.Â

All corresponding bus stops will be made along detour route.

Allow additional travel time.Â Â



Planned Detour
M31 bus stop change

Until further notice

Buses are bypassing the York Av at 61 St stop.

Westbound: Customers are advised to board
on 62 St at York Av.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M22 bus stop change due to construction

Until further notice

Temporary bus stop change due to construction.

M22 Westbound: Buses will bypass stops on
Chambers St at Church St and West Broadway.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M22 buses detoured due to the Chambers Street Reconstruction Project Phase II

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from Chambers St between
North End Av and Broadway.

Eastbound: Buses will make stops along Warren St
between North End Av and West St.

On Warren St between Broadway and Church St at
corresponding locations.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M20 bus stop closure

Until further notice

Buses will not make the stop on 7 Av South at
Waverly Pl between Charles and Perry Sts.

M20 Southbound: Buses will make stops on
7 Av South at 10 and 12 Sts.




Planned Detour
M5 and M20 temporary bus stop change

Until further notice

Bus stops on State St on the far side of Whitehall and Water Sts
and on the near side of Broad St are temporarily closed.

Northbound: For the State St at Whitehall St bus stop, customers
are advised to board southbound on State St near the South Ferry
Terminal entrance.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M20 buses detoured due to the Chambers Street Reconstruction Project

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from West Broadway at
Chambers St.

Southbound: Buses will make stops on Reade St
and West Broadway.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M15 temporary bus stop change

Until further notice

Bus stops along South St at Broad and Whitehall Sts are
temporarily closed.

Northbound: For the Broad St and Whitehall St stops,
customers are advised to board at the South Ferry Terminal.

For the Water St at Broad St bus stop, customers are advised
to board at Old Slip.

• Please allow additional travel time.

line.name: Q1 - Q113
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 05/22/2013  7:31PM

Q33 buses detoured due to road work on 82 St.Â

Detour is as follows:

Southbound: Via 82 St, right on Astoria Blvd, left on 80 St, left on 25 Av, right on 82 St and regular route.

Corresponding stops will be made along detoured route.



Service Change  Posted: 05/22/2013  3:34PM

Q16 bus detoured due to road work on Francis Lewis Blvd between 26 Av and 29 Av.

Detour is as follows:

Westbound Willets Point Blvd route: Via Francis Lewis Blvd, right on 26 Av, left on 168 St, right on 29 Av and regular route.

Westbound Utopia Pkwy route: Via 26 Av, left on 168 St, right on 29 Av and regular route.Â Â

Eastbound: Via 29 Av, right on 170 St, left on 32 Av, left on Francis Lewis Blvd and regular route.

Allow additional travel time.



Service Change  Posted: 05/22/2013  3:34PM

Q22 bus detoured due to road work on Seagirt Blvd at Beach 9 St.

Detour is as follows:

Eastbound: Via Seagirt Blvd, left on Beach 9 St, left on Cornega Av and then regular route.

All buses will make corresponding stops along detour route on Beach 9 St.

Allow additional travel time.

Q7 buses detoured due to construction

All times

Buses will not make stops on 148 Av between 150
Av and South Cargo Rd.

Westbound: Buses will make corresponding stops
along South Cargo Rd.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
Q42 buses detoured due to water main repairs

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from Polhemas Av, Fern
Pl and 177 St.

Eastbound/Westbound: Buses will make stops
along 173 St at corresponding locations.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
Q25, Q34 and Q65 buses detoured due to construction

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from Archer Av at Parsons Blvd.

Southbound: Buses will make stops along Jamaica Av at
corresponding locations.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
Q22 and Q52 buses detoured due to construction

Until Mon, Jun 3

Buses are being detoured from Rockaway Beach Blvd.

Westbound: Buses will make stops along Shore Front
Pkwy at corresponding locations.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
Q2 and Q110 service to Belmont Park Racetrack

All times

Q2/Q112 buses will stop inside the racetrack on race
days and will enter the track at Gate 1.

Direct Q2 service from:
Jamaica-179 St [F] Station
165 St Bus Terminal

Direct Q110 service from:
Parsons Blvd [F] Station
Jamaica Center-Parsons/Archer [E] [J] [Z] Station

When Belmont Race Track is Closed:
Eastbound Terminal: Belmont Park Racetrack bus
terminal.

When Belmont Race Track is Open:
Eastbound: Drop-off stop in Lane # 1 next to escalator.

Westbound: Pick up stop in Lane # 3 next to stairs.

Note: There is no racing on Mon and Tues, with the
exception of Mon, May 27 (Memorial Day).




Planned Detour
Q10 Lefferts Blvd Branch to be limited stop only

Beginning, Sunday, Apr 28

All Q10 Lefferts Blvd Branch local buses will change to
limited stop to provide faster, more consistent service.
The Q10 limited will give exclusive service to the Lefferts
Blvd Branch south of Rockaway Blvd in South Ozone Pk.

The hours of service for the Q10 Limited will be expanded
5:30 am to 11:30 pm on weekdays
6:15 am to 11:30 pm on Saturdays and Sundays

Q10 limited bus stop added in both directions
• Lefferts Blvd and 150 Av

Q10 local only bus stops on the Lefferts Blvd
Branch to be discontinued:
• Lefferts Blvd at Sutter Av, 133 Av and 149 Av

Q10 local service will continue to operate via the
130 St branch. Service on the 130 St branch will
remain unchanged.

line.name: S40 - S98
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 05/22/2013  3:33PM

S44, S59Â and S79 buses are detoured due to construction at the Macy's bus stop.

Detour is as follows:

S44 to St George Ferry: Via Ring Rd, left at Main entrance (Staten Island Mall Marquee), right on Richmond Av and then regular route.

S44 to K-Mart/Yokon Av: Via Richmond Av, left at Main entrance (Staten Island Mall Marquee), right on Ring Rd and then regular route.

S59 to Port Richmond: Via Ring Rd, left on at Main entrance (Staten Island Mall Marquee), right on Richmond Av and regular route.

S59 to Hylan Blvd/Richmond Av or Tottenville: Via Richmond Av, left on Main entrance (Staten Island Mall Marquee) right on Ring Rd and the regular route.

S79 to Bay Ridge 86 St: Via Richmond Hill Rd, left on Richmond Av, left on Main entrance (Staten Island Mall Marquee), right Ring Rd and then regular route.

S79 to March Av/Ring Rd: Via Ring Rd, left on Main entrance (Staten Island Mall Marquee), right on Richmond Av, right on Richmond Hill Rd and then regular route.

Allow additional travel time.



Planned Detour
S44, S61, S91 and S94 buses detoured due to construction

All times

Buses are being detoured from the Yukon Av Terminal.

Eastbound/Westbound: Buses will use the S59 bus
stop on Yukon Av between Forest Hill Rd and Richmond
Av located behind the Stop & Shop Supermarket.

• Please allow additional travel time.

line.name: Montauk
line.text:
Montauk Branch Customers:

The 6:17PM train from Jamaica due Montauk at 9:07PM is operating 11 minutes late due to earlier congestion caused by signal trouble

line.name: Ronkonkoma
line.text:
Ronkonkoma Branch Customers:

  • The 7:11PM train from Penn due in Ronkonkoma at 8:33PM is delayed near Hollis due to equipment trouble.

line.name: Wassaic
line.text:
Wassaic Branch Busing Begins April 7

Buses replace Wassaic Branch train service April 7 through June 2 between 9 AM and 5 PM on weekdays, and between 8 AM and 3 PM on Sundays to accommodate a rock slope remediation project. The bus schedule is included in the April 7 Harlem Line timetables. See http://bit.ly/9rsE8k for schedule.
